::Battera::

"Look, I meant no harm.  I was just getting, well, bored sitting in 
my room all by myself for hours on end.  I thought I'd pass the time 
by seeing what's about."  She started to turn away.
"I'm sorry to have bothered you.  I'll go and wait in my quarters."  
she turned and walked down the hall.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex frowns, lowering his gun but still ready. Chordate should 
really have 
> informed him of this.
> 
> "Chordate," he says into his comm-link, "Did you allow someone to 
get into 
> the ship? They've been wandering around near the bridge."
> 
> He looks at Battera. "Our leader's out at the moment. What are you 
doing 
> waltzing around the ship? There are areas that are dangerous here."
